question.HAU: Mu tane masu lafiya, ya kamata su bayar da tazara.
question.KAU: Am nganza dǝ, sandiye kate amma ro kasam sakkǝ
question.ENG: Healthy people should practice social distancing.

answer.HAU:
Ga abubuwan da ƙwararru suke faɗa don kariya daga Covid-19:  \n
 
 🦠Wanke hannaye akai-akai (na aƙalla daƙiƙa ashirin 20) ta amfani da ruwa da sabulu ko kuma amfani da sinadarin tsabtace hannu mai ɗauke da alkahol.  \n
 🦠A bar ratar aƙalla mita 2 tsakaninku da juna yayin da ake a cikin mutane. 📏👩🏾‍🌾  \n
 🦠Guji taɓa idanu, hanci da baki — har sai an fara wanke hannuwa.  \n
 🦠A zauna a gida idan ana jin rashin lafiya.  \n

Hukumar lafiya ta dniya WHO da kuma wasu kwararru a fannin lafiya sun gano cewa wanke hannuwa akai-akai yana kare kamuwa da Covid-19 fiye da sanya safar hannu  💦🧼
answer.KAU:
Ngo awo am nzunduwu dǝ ye gulzanawo kwasa Covid-19 be dǝn yitkaa ro:  \n

🦠Kǝla kǝla lan muskonǝmma tulle (sekon 20 yayi ro) awo musko cinta be njia kuru shawullan tulle.  \n
🦠Nyi dawu jamayen na kasam mita 2 yayi indi katendon kwallo. 📏👩🏾‍🌾  \n
🦠 Shim nǝmma letǝ wanne, kǝnza nǝmma kuru ci nǝmma — buron muskonǝmma tulle do.  \n
🦠 Kǝji fannumba maa faton namne.  \n

World Health Organization na cidawu nzunduwa nasha nǝlefa be isa asuzana muko tultu kla klan dǝ shima kwasa Covid-19 be faijin kla zambu musko be faidatǝ ro. 💦🧼
answer.ENG:
Here is what the experts say can protect against COVID-19 infection:  \n

🦠Wash your hands regularly (for at least 20 seconds) with an alcohol-based hand gel or wash them with soap and water.  \n
🦠Maintain a distance of at least 2 metres from others when in public. 📏👩🏾‍🌾  \n
🦠Avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth — wash your hands first.   \n
🦠Stay home if you don't feel well.  \n

The World Health Organisation and other health experts have found that washing your hands regularly protects against Covid-19 better than wearing gloves. 💦🧼

question.HAU: Marasa lafiya ne kadai ya kamata su sanya takunkumin fuska a cikin taron jama'a
question.KAU: Am dondi dǝ sandima dawu jami ye dǝn zambu ikko muradǝzana wo
question.ENG: Only sick people need to wear masks in public spaces.

answer.HAU:
Zaka iya kare kanka ka kuma kare wasu a cikin abubuwan hawa na haya ta hanyar bin matakan kariyar da hukumomin lafiya na duniya da NCDC suka bayar:  \n

🧼 🖐🏾 Wanke hannu kafin tafiya  \n
😷 Sanya takunkumin fuska  \n
🛣️ Kuyi kokarin tafiya lokutan da babu mutane da yawa ko kuma a bi hanyar da babu cunkoso, a kuma yi yar tafiyar kafa  \n
🚶🏿‍♂️ ko kuma a je inda ake son zuwa a kafa idan da hali  \n
🧼 🖐🏾 Da zarar an isa wurin da aka yi niyyar zuwa, a sake wanke hannu kamar yadda aka wanke a kafin fitowa
answer.KAU:
Rakǝm fainǝmin kla nǝmma am gapsǝna soa awo kǝmbaye jami mewula lan zawal kashimo be rowata done cidawu nǝlefabe dunyabe ya NCDC a:  \n

🧼 🖐🏾Musko nǝm ma tulle kawu lenǝmin no  \n
😷 Zambu fuska be ikke  \n
🛣️ Blaro dimmin na sa zawal dǝn kam ngu so ba lan blaro ne  \n
🚶🏿 Letǝ ngu so shi lan au dukso shi lan lene raknǝmin maa  \n
🧼 🖐🏾 Zǝbtǝram nǝm naamiya, muskonǝm ma waltǝne tulle
answer.ENG:
You can protect yourself and others on public transport by following these guidelines from global health authorities and NCDC:  \n

🧼 🖐🏾 Wash your hands before you go  \n
😷 Wear a mask  \n
🛣️ Try to travel during quieter times or along less-busy routes  \n
🚶🏿‍♂️ Walk some or all of the trip if you can  \n
🧼 🖐🏾 Once you arrive at your destination, wash your hands again

question.HAU: Idan wani a gidanmu yana da alamun COVID-19, ya kamata ya kebe kansa (kar yayi cudanya da mutanen gidan)
question.KAU: Kam laa suro fanyi ye dǝn shin alama COVID-19 ye mbeji wa sandiya sǝriro tǝtǝluwu (am gade suro fato ye dǝ ro wande letanyi)
question.ENG: If someone in my house has symptoms of COVID-19 they should be isolated (stay away from) other people in the house.

answer.HAU:
Masana sun ce, ba lallai ne sai kun bayar da tazara tsakaninku da abokan zama ko yan uwanku a gida ba sai dai idan kuna zargin wani ya kamu da COVID-19.💞  \n

Hakan na nufin COVID19 na yaduwa ne daga mutum zuwa mutum, kun ga kenan karancin mutanen da kuka yi cudanya da su; raguwar shiga hadarin kamuwa da cutar da kuma yadawa abokan zamanku ko ragowar mutane.
answer.KAU:
Mbu ngiyi niya fatomanəm ma aw am gade sowa katen doro kasam yiko də adə dimmin sa sandiya təmaa maro kwasa Covid-19 be dəe zamzəna maa do, Nzundumazu soye gulza. 💞  \n


Kwasa Covid-19 be də kate kam soyin tartin, kam sowa nguu ro kəltem kənənga diyo ba də shiye səkkə kwasa dəye niya zamjin ba kuru zamtə ba dəe səkkə kam gade aw kərauma nəm ro kwasa dəa tarrəm ba.
answer.ENG:
You don't need to physically distance from your partner or others living in your house unless you suspect one of you might have COVID-19, experts say. 💞  \n

That said, COVID-19 spreads from person to person, so the fewer people you meet, the less chance you have of catching the virus and passing it to your partner or other loved ones.

question.KAU: Antibiotic dǝ raksǝ COVID-19 dǝa ngazǝyin

answer.HAU:
❌ Magungunan Antibiotics ba sa aiki akan ƙwayoyin cuta dangin birus, kamar na Covid-19. 
Magungunan antibiotics suna aiki ne kawai akan ƙwayoyin cuta na bakteriya.💊  \n
  
🏥 Wasu lokuta idan mutane sun samu kulawar Covid-19 a asibiti, suna samun magungunan antibiotics domin kulawa da ƙarin wasu cutar bakteriyar da suke da shi, amma ba sa magance cutar Covid-19 a cewar Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya.
answer.KAU:
❌ Kurun Antibiotic be cidajin bawo kǝla kuli kwasabe so din, misallo Covid-19. Shi Antibiotic dǝ bacteria fallo kurunjin.💊  \n
  
 🏥 Salaan amso dǝ sandiya Covid-19 din litarin ngatǝya, sandiro antibiotic wa tin kwasawa bacteria ye suwudǝna gadesowa ngatǝro, amma shi Covid-19 dǝ raitǝro gǝnyi, futu World Health Organisation ye gulzǝna dǝ yayi.
answer.ENG:
❌ Antibiotics do not work against viruses, like COVID-19. Antibiotics only work against bacteria.💊  \n
 
🏥 Sometimes when people get treated for COVID-19 in the hospital, they get antibiotics to treat an additional bacterial infection they have, but not to treat the COVID-19 infection itself, according to the World Health Organisation.

question.HAU: A yanzu babu takamaiman maganin COVID-19.
question.KAU: Kǝrma dǝ ro kurun COVID-19 ye dǝ bawo
question.ENG: There is currently no treatment for COVID-19.

answer.HAU: Babu wani takamaiman maganin Covid-19 - sai dai kawai allurar rigakafi don kiyaye kamuwa da ita - amma masanan kimiyya a fadin duniya na cigaba da gwaje-gwajen wasu magunguna da ake sanya rai su zamo magani a cewar NCDC 👩🏻‍⚕️👨🏿‍🔬🧪
answer.KAU: Kurun kwasa Covid-19 be nasku ba – awo daana shima kurun kǝla yitkawu be kwasa dǝ faitǝro - amma am sciencebe dinayi dǝ jarapsen kurun suro bozen ma antiviral daji kuru kurunna laa gade ngazǝyinma, NCDC gulzǝ. 👩🏻‍⚕️👨🏿‍🔬🧪
answer.ENG: There is no specific cure for COVID-19 — only vaccines to prevent infection — but scientists around the world are running trials on antiviral and other medications as potential treatments, NCDC says. 👩🏻‍⚕️👨🏿‍🔬🧪

question.HAU: Duk wanda ya kamu da COVID-19 yana bukatar a duba shi a asibiti.
question.KAU: Kam done shi lan COVID-19 mbejiyo so lezǝ litarin kurun diyo mǝradǝzǝna.
question.ENG: Everyone with COVID-19 needs to be treated in a hospital.

answer.HAU:
Mafi yawan mutane suna warkewa daga Covid-19 ba tare da zama a asibiti. Idan kana da ɗaya daga cikin waɗannan alamomin:  \n
 
 🦠 Tari  \n
 🦠 Wahalar numfashi  \n
 🦠 Zazzaɓi  \n
 
 ...Gwamnati za ta so ku garzaya ku yi gwaji kyauta don tabbatarwa ko lafiyarku kalau. Amma kowa a cikin iyalai na an yi masa gwaji kuma sun ce babu wata matsala 💗  

Ina sauraronka, ko zaka tambaye ni wurin da za a yi maka gwaji — Na san amsar! 👨🏾🧪
answer.KAU:
Amwa gǝwuso Covid-19 din ngazayin letarin namzayi yayi. Alamawa adǝ nyi lan mbejiro fangam ma:  \n
 
 🦠 Kasau  \n
 🦠 Assadin yintǝ  \n
 🦠 Kange  \n
 
 ... Gomnatiye nyiye lenǝm ngal diye diwo dǝ sǝrauna tawattǝro. Am fandeye dukso ngal dǝ sadǝna kuru ngal dǝ batti gǝyi ada 💗  \n

Wa kore ndan raknǝm ngal dimmin no – adǝ nogǝna! 👨🏾🧪
answer.ENG:
Most people recover from COVID-19 without having to stay in the hospital. If you have any of these symptoms:  \n

🦠 A cough  \n
🦠 Difficulty breathing  \n
🦠 A fever  \n
...the government would like you to go get a free test to confirm. Everyone in my family has been tested and they say it's not so bad 💗  \n

Go ahead, ask me where you can get tested — I know this one! 👨🏾🧪

question.HAU: Daina jin kamshi ko wari ko kuma dandano alamu ne na COVID-19
question.KAU: Kayino fantǝ bawo au Lele fantǝ bawo dǝ  alama COVID-19 ye
question.ENG: A loss of smell or taste is a symptom of COVID-19.

answer.HAU:
Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya ta ce, waɗannan sune alamun cutar Covid-19:  \n
 
 Sanannun alamu;  \n
 🦠Zazzaɓi  \n
 🦠tarin da babu majina  \n
 🦠Gajiya  \n
 
 Alamun da ba a sani ba sosai;  \n
 🦠Ciwon jiki  \n
 🦠Ciwon maƙogoro  \n
 🦠Gudawa  \n
 🦠Ciwon idanuwa  \n
 🦠Ciwon kai  \n
 🦠Rashin jin ɗanɗano ko ƙamshi  \n
 🦠Ƙaiƙayin fata  \n
 🦠Canjin launin yatsun hannu ko ƙafa  \n
 
 Alamu masu tsanani;  \n
 🦠Wahalar numfashi ko ɗaukewar numfashi.  \n
 🦠Ciwon ƙirji  \n
 🦠Rashin iya magana ko motsi  \n
 
 📝 A wasu lokuta, wasu ba sa nuna kowace alama ko kaɗan.
answer.KAU:
Futu karabka nǝlefa be dinaye World Health Organisation bayanzǝna dǝ, Alamaa Covid-19 be adǝ:  \n
 
 Alaamaa nowata ngai  \n
 🦠Kange  \n
 🦠Kasau harrata  \n
 🦠Yim baro  \n
 
 Alamaa doni zauro tǝdin bama  \n
 🦠Tiyi lilim ta kuru tiyi zau wa  \n
 🦠Dau zawu  \n
 🦠Yarta  \n
 🦠Shim halakta  \n
 🦠Kǝla sǝrun  \n
 🦠Lele fantǝ baa kuru keuno fantǝ baa  \n
 🦠Tiyinǝm lan tuno luwo  \n
 🦠Furamiya muskoye ya shiye ya so namtǝ  \n
 
 Alamaaa doni zauro kura ma  \n
 🦠Assadin kamme yin tǝ au yintǝ kori kori.  \n
 🦠Karǝgǝ zawu au hangalza  \n
 🦠Manaro tiyero au latǝro tiyero  \n
 📝 Laanza din, amwa laa gade sandiyakwasadǝ ye zamzǝnaso dǝ tiyinzan alamadǝma bawo asǝlanmaro.
answer.ENG:
According to the World Health Organisation, these are the symptoms of COVID-19:  \n

Common symptoms  \n
🦠Fever  \n
🦠Dry cough  \n
🦠Tiredness  \n

Less common symptoms  \n
🦠Aches and pains  \n
🦠Sore throat  \n
🦠Diarrhoea  \n
🦠Conjunctivitis  \n
🦠Headache  \n
🦠Loss of taste or smell  \n
🦠A rash on your skin  \n
🦠Discolouration of fingers or toes  \n

Serious symptoms  \n
🦠Difficulty breathing or shortness of breath.  \n
🦠Chest pain or pressure  \n
🦠Loss of speech or movement  \n

📝 In many cases, infected people have no symptoms at all.

question.HAU: In dai an kamu da COVID-19, zata bayyana ne tsakanin kwana 2 zuwa 14 kafin nuna alama.
question.KAU: Nya COVID-19 ye zamjiya, kawu 2 kawu 14 saadin kawu alamanzǝ dǝ bayantin dǝ ro
question.ENG: Once infected with COVID-19, it can take 2 to 14 days to show symptoms.

answer.HAU:
Lokaci tsakanin kamuwa da cutar da fara bayyanar alamunta ana kiransa da lokacin ƙyanƙyasa. 📆 🤒  \n
Alamun cutar Covid-19 yawanci suna farawa ne tsakanin kwana ɗaya zuwa kwanaki goma sha huɗu bayan an kamu da ita, a cewar Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya WHO.
answer.KAU:
Wotku kuli kwasabe dǝ kǝntabewa kuru kawu shi alamwa dǝ fulejin dǝ shiro woktu kaltǝben sha botin. 📆 🤒  \n
 Shi alamaa Covid-19 be dǝ gǝwuso ro badi jin kate kawu falla kuru kawu 14 ngawo kuli kwasabe dǝ ro letǝmaben, shi World Heath Organisation ne wano.
answer.ENG:
The time between catching the virus and starting to show symptoms is called the incubation period. 📆 🤒  \n
Symptoms of COVID-19 usually start between one and 14 days after you catch the virus, the World Heath Organisation says.

question.HAU: Idan baka da zazzabi mai zafi, to baka da COVID-19
question.KAU: Nyin kange zau bawo maa nyin COVID-19 ba
question.ENG: If you don't have a high fever you don't have COVID-19

answer.HAU:
Mafi yawan mutane suna warkewa daga Covid-19 ba tare da zama a asibiti. Idan kana da ɗaya daga cikin waɗannan alamomin:  \n
 
 🦠 Tari  \n
 🦠 Wahalar numfashi  \n
 🦠 Zazzaɓi  \n
 
 ...Gwamnati za ta so ku garzaya ku yi gwaji kyauta don tabbatarwa ko lafiyarku kalau. Amma kowa a cikin iyalai na an yi masa gwaji kuma sun ce babu wata matsala 💗  

Ina sauraronka, ko zaka tambaye ni wurin da za a yi maka gwaji — Na san amsar! 👨🏾🧪
answer.KAU:
Amwa gǝwuso Covid-19 din ngazayin letarin namzayi yayi. Alamawa adǝ nyi lan mbejiro fangam ma:  \n
 
 🦠 Kasau  \n
 🦠 Assadin yintǝ  \n
 🦠 Kange  \n
 
 ... Gomnatiye nyiye lenǝm ngal diye diwo dǝ sǝrauna tawattǝro. Am fandeye dukso ngal dǝ sadǝna kuru ngal dǝ batti gǝyi ada 💗  \n

Wa kore ndan raknǝm ngal dimmin no – adǝ nogǝna! 👨🏾🧪
answer.ENG:
Most people recover from COVID-19 without having to stay in the hospital. If you have any of these symptoms:  \n

🦠 A cough  \n
🦠 Difficulty breathing  \n
🦠 A fever  \n
...the government would like you to go get a free test to confirm. Everyone in my family has been tested and they say it's not so bad 💗  \n

Go ahead, ask me where you can get tested — I know this one! 👨🏾🧪

question.HAU: Allurar rigakafin COVID-19 ba zata sa ka kamu da cutar COVID-19 ba
question.KAU: Shi liwula kalimi COVID-19 ye dǝ nyiro kwasa COVID-19 ye dǝ cin bawo
question.ENG: The COVID-19 vaccine cannot infect you with the COVID-19 disease.

answer.HAU:
Ga abinda hukumomin tallafi na kasa da kasa Red Cross da kuma Red Crecent (IFRC) suke cewa kan matsalar allurorin rigakafi:  \n

"Kamar kowanne magani, allurorin rigakafi suna da nasu matsalolin. yawanci na gajeren lokaci ko masu tafiya nan take, kamar irinsu gajiya ko ciwon kai ko zafin allurar. Mutane da yawa ba sa samun kowacce matsala. 

Yana iya faruwa da kowacce allurar rigakafi wasu su ji rashin lafiya gajera ta dan wani lokaci saboda garkuwar jikinsu ce take karbar sakon karin kwari, amma jin hakan ba na allurar rigakafin COVID-19 ba ne kuma allurar ba zata sawa wani COVID-19 ba."
answer.KAU:
Waneye kalimi dǝ ye nyiro illa laa suwudin

Ngo awo done International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies (IFRC) be kla kaziyii done liwula kalimi be suron dəana gulzana də:  \n

“Kurunna gade yeyi so, liwula kalimi ye dəe raksə kaziyi suwudin. Ngun za so kammbayi au gana, shima na liwula sakkəna də zau yayi ro waljin, yimbaro au klasərən.  \n

Am nguu ro kaziyi suwudin ba, liwula kalimi be nguu lan waajin kamye tinzə gana kuttu fanjin sau duno tinzə də protein tinzə dəro kalakciyin, amma adə kəndondi kwasa Covid-19 be gəyi, kuru liwula kalimi ye də nyiro kwasa Covid-19 be cin ba wo.”
answer.ENG:
You might have side effects from taking the vaccine 

Here's what the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies (IFRC) says about vaccine side effects:  \n
\n
Like all medicines, vaccines can cause side effects. Most of these are mild and short-term, such as pain at the injection site, tiredness or a headache.  \n
\n
Many people don't get any side effects. It can happen with many vaccines that some people might feel slightly unwell because their immune system is responding to the protein, but this is not a COVID-19 illness and the vaccine can’t give you COVID-19."

question.HAU: Ko an yi maka allurar rigakafi, dole ne ka cigaba da bin matakan kariya kamar bayar da tazara da sanya takunkumi.
question.KAU: Am liwula kalimi ye dǝ gozana dǝ kwamison katap nzǝkaye misallo kate kamman kasam kwaltǝa kuru zambu ikko wa dǝ sadǝ
question.ENG: People who have been vaccinated still need to follow protective measures like physical distancing and wearing masks.

answer.HAU:
Duk alluran rigakafin da Najeriya ta karba sai da aka tabbatar da sun bi matakai da hanyoyin tantance rashin illarsu daga hukumomin wasu kasashen da kuma NAFDAC, kuma duk allurorin na da karfin dakatar da wadanda aka yi wa bayyanar alamomi masu hadari na COVID-19 💉 💯  \n

Duk da hakan, akwai bukatar mu cigaba da sanya takunkumin rufe hanci da bayar da tazara da kuma wanke hannu akai-akai ko bayan karbar allurar rigakafi, saboda har yanzu babu tabbacin cewa ko allurar rigakafin zata hana mu yadawa wasu cutar.
answer.KAU:
Liwula kalimi be dukso done fandiyen ma dǝ nasha NAFDAC a ladǝa gade soa be tawatsana nǝm ngla liwula dǝe dǝ, kuru dukso cida ngǝla za ro tawatkata am liwula kalimi be de so gozana dǝ sandiya kwasa laa gade Covid-19 be gade gotǝ ro dapcin 💉 💯  \n

Adaima kuru,zambu fuskaye dǝa yiko mǝradǝtǝna, kasam kate nyia kamma be ro iko wa muskonǝm kla klan tultuwa so, ngawo liwula kalimi be dǝ goneman kuntǝn, sau kwamison noniyen de liwula kalimi be  kwasa dǝ tartǝ ro dapcin na ro.
answer.ENG:
All the vaccines that we get in Nigeria will have been proved safe and effective by regulators in other countries and by NAFDAC, and all of them will be effective in stopping vaccinated people from developing serious COVID-19 disease 💉 💯  \n

Still, we will need to keep wearing masks, physical distancing and washing hands regularly, even after we get vaccinated, because we don't yet know if vaccination can stop us from spreading the disease.

question.HAU: Idan zaka iya dakatar da numfashi na tsawon dakika 10, to ba ka da COVID-19.
question.KAU: Raknum yintǝnum sekon 10 ronǝminna nyin COVID-19 dǝ bawo
question.ENG: If you can hold your breath for 10 seconds, you don’t have COVID-19.

answer.HAU:
Najeriya ta amice da hanyoyi biyu na yin gwanji don gano wanda ya kamu da COVID-19. 

Sune:  \n
🧪 Gwajin PCR, wanda ake ganin shi yafi kowanne bayar da cikakken sakamako.  \n

🧪 Gwajin RDTs, wanda yake fitar da sakamako cikin gaggawa fiye da gwajin PRC, amma yana iya fitar da sakamako mai kuskure.  \n
➕ Ko ma dai wane gwaji aka yi maka, zaka iya yarda da sakamakon idan ya nuna ka kamu a cewar masana.  \n

➖ Idan kuma sakamakon gwajin ya nuna baka da cutar, za a iya cewa a sake yi maka wani gwajin don tabbatarwa.  \n

🆓 Duk kowanne gwajin kyauta ne.  \n

Kuna iya tambayar masu gwajin ko har tsawon yaushe zaku jira karbar sakamakon, ta wacce hanya za a turo muku sakamakon da kuma me zaka yi idan sakamakon bai zo ba.
answer.KAU:
Nigeriyabe ngal kala indi kwasa Covid-19 be wutə ro kasaksə:  \n

🧪 Ngal PCR be, shiro ngalawo ro fəlejin no ba.  \n

🧪 Ngal Antigen-based Rapid Diagnostic tests (RDTs) be, shima dai ro resultə fəlejin no ngal PCR be də yayi ro, amma resultə kal kal gəyi raksə fəlejin.  \n

➕ Ngal ndaso dimmiya yayi, kwasa də raksə nyi lan mbeji ro waljin, nzundumazu soye gulza.  \n

➖ Resultə nəm dən nyi lan ba fəleno ma, watta nyiro ngal gade diye gulzen  \n

🆓 Ngal də dəkso de ro sadin.  \n

Na done nyiro ngal dəa sadin də sandiya koro ro sa resultə də nyia naziyin də sandəna, futu nyiro resultə dəa zuwazen də, daji kuru awo diwo be dəa na də nyia resultə dəye nazənyi ma.
answer.ENG:
Nigeria has approved two types of tests for detecting current COVID-19 infection:  \n

🧪 PCR tests, which are considered the most accurate.  \n

🧪 Antigen-based Rapid Diagnostic Tests (RDTs), which give results more quickly than PCR tests, but may produce more false negative results.  \n 

➕ Regardless of what kind of test you get, you can be fairly sure that a positive result is accurate, health experts say.  \n

➖ If you get a negative result, you may be asked to take another test to confirm.  \n

🆓 All tests are free of charge.  \n

Consider asking at your testing site how long you might need to wait for the result, how it will be sent to you, and what to do if it doesn't come.

question.HAU: Tsofaffi ne kadai zasu iya mutuwa ta dalilin COVID-19
question.KAU: Am ngǝlinza lezǝna dǝ sandima sandiya COVID-19 ye lorujinno
question.ENG: Only old people can die from COVID-19.

answer.HAU:
Tsofaffin mutane 👴🏾 da waɗanda suke da wasu ciwo na daban kamar (hawan jini, matsalolin zuciya ko huhu, ciwon sukari ko ciwon daji) sun fi yiwuwar samun alamun cutar mai tsanani.  \n

👧🏾 A cewar hukumar lafiya ta duniya, yara ma suna cikin hadarin kamuwa da COVID-19.  \n
 
Amma kowa na iya kamuwa da Covid-19 kuma ya yi rashin lafiya mai tsanani. 🎲
answer.KAU:
👴🏾 Am kurawa kuru amwa do tiyinzan kwsa gade mbejimaso dǝ (kwasa buye, karǝgǝye au huhuye, kwasa sǝwurye, au tunu kura) sandi lan waneye kwasa zaujin.  \n

👧🏾 Duliso dǝ ye sandiya raksǝ tajirwa Covid-19 be zamjin, futu karabka nǝlefabe dunyabe World Health Organisation be gulzǝna dǝ.  \n

🎲Kwamison, ndu yayi sha Covid-19 be raksǝ zamjin kuru zauro dondi ro waljin.
answer.ENG:
👴🏾 Older people and those with other health conditions (high blood pressure, heart or lung problems, diabetes or cancer) are more likely to have serious symptoms.  \n

👧🏾 Children are also at risk of catching COVID-19, according to the World Health Organisation.  \n

🎲Still, anyone can get COVID-19 and become seriously ill.

question.HAU: Hadarin COVID-19 bai wuce na mura ba.
question.KAU: COVID-19 dǝ tantanyi wa num zauyin kozǝnyi
question.ENG: COVID-19 isn't more dangerous than the flu.

answer.HAU:
Wasu muhimman bambanci tsakanin mura da COVID-19:  \n

🦠 COVID-19 mafi yawan lokuta na iya haifar da matsanancin rashin lafiyar dake bukatar ganin kwararru sabanin mura.  \n

🦠 COVID-19 tana kashe mutane fiye da mura.  \n

🦠 COVID-19 tana yaduwa da sauri fiye da mura.  \n

🦠 COVID-19 akwai magungunan da aka amince da su na mura, amma har yanzu babu wani sahihin maganin COVID-19 da aka sani.  \n

🦠 Mura yawanci bata gusar da dandano ko saka daina jin wari, amma COVID-19 wani lokacin zai iya kawo su.  \n

Abin dadin shi ne matakan da ake dauka na kariya daga daukar COVID-19 shi ne kuma zai taimaka wajen bayar da kariya daga kamuwa da mura.
answer.KAU:
Awoa laa so done kwasa Covid-19 be ya tantayi ya yaksǝna dǝ sandima:  \n

🦠 Kwasa Covid-19 be dəe raksə nəlefa baa naa kozəna kam ro kamro suwudin litari ro lezəyi mbu ro sha sədin kwasa tantayi be yayi ro.  \n

🦠 Covid-19 də shima kam so nguu ro cezəna wo tantayi yayi ro.  \n

🦠 Covid-19 də shima kəsken am soro tartin wo tantayi yayi ro.  \n

🦠 Kurun tantayi be kasakkata so mbeji, amma kurun Covid-19 be kambo ro kasaksana ma ba də ba.  \n

🦠 Tantayi də nguu ro lele fantǝ baa kuru keuno fantǝ baa suwudin ba, amma salaan shi Covid 19 dǝ adǝ suwudin.  \n

Awoye ngǝlanzǝ dǝ shima zawal done gam kǝlanǝm ma kwasa Covid-19 be ro yitkaa min dǝ nya tantayi be ro sǝtkayin.
answer.ENG:
Some key differences between the flu and COVID-19:  \n

🦠 COVID-19 infection is more likely to cause serious illness and require medical attention than the flu.  \n

🦠 COVID-19 has a higher death rate than the flu.  \n 

🦠 COVID-19 spreads more quickly than the flu.  \n

🦠 There are approved treatments for the flu, but no widely approved treatments for COVID-19.  \n

🦠 The flu does not usually cause loss of taste and smell, but COVID-19 can sometimes cause this symptom.  \n

The good news is that the same measures that help protect you from COVID-19 infection also help you protect against the flu.

question.HAU: Shan sinadarai dangin methanol da ethanol ba zasu kare ni daga kamuwa da COVID-19
question.KAU: Ethanol au kurun gade kuli kwasa ye njezoma dǝ kǝnzaye nya COVID-19 ye kǝnta ro dabcin bawo
question.ENG: Drinking methanol, ethanol or other disinfectants cannot protect me against COVID-19

answer.HAU:
Ga wasu abubuwa da ba sa aiki ko kaɗan akan Covid-19:  \n
 
 ❌ Shan Sigari — wannan zai yi maku illa 🚬  \n
 ❌ Shan magunguna antibiotics — COVID-19 rukunin ƙwayar cutar birus ce, kuma magungunan antibiotics ba sa aiki akan birus 💊  \n
 ❌ Shan sinadaran kashe ƙwayoyin cuta — yin wannan zai iya janyowa a rasa rai.  \n
❌ Chitta ba ya warkar da corona  \n
  
 Ga abubuwan da hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya ta ce game da waɗannan da sauran jita-jita (Da Turanci kawai) 👉🏾 https://bit.ly/37OgW73
answer.KAU:
Ngawo awo laa Covid-19 dǝ ro tǝmmaro faidajinba ma:  \n
 
 ❌ Tafa yawo — adǝ dǝ nyiro zawu gǝnazǝyin 🚬  \n
 ❌ Kurunna antibiotics be kǝnza — shi Covid dǝ kuli kwasa, kuru shi antibiotics dǝ kuli kwasabe ro faidajin bawo 💊  \n
 ❌ Nji kurunne kuli kwasa cintabe kǝnza — adǝwa kǝndo dǝ nya chejin  \n
❌ Kajiwar raksu corona da gojin ba  \n
 
  Ngoshi awo doni karabka nǝlefabe dunyabe bayanzǝna ma World Health Organization ne kǝla fane-fane gade amwaso be gulzayin din (Nasara bas) 👉🏾 https://bit.ly/37OgW73
answer.ENG:
Here are some things that don't work at all against COVID-19:  \n

❌ Smoking — this can only hurt you  🚬  \n
❌ Taking antibiotics — COVID-19 is a virus, and antibiotics don't work against viruses 💊  \n
❌ Drinking disinfectants — doing this could kill you  \n
❌Ginger does not cure against corona  \n
  \n

 Here's what the World Health Organization says about these and other rumours (English only) 👉🏾 https://bit.ly/37OgW73
